getLexisNexisCbdAttributes

public array getLexisNexisCbdAttributes()

Get LexisNexis Chargeback Defender attribute data associated with the RIS transaction. Please contact your Kount representative to enable support for this feature in your merchant account.

getLexisNexisInstantIdAttributes

public array getLexisNexisInstantIdAttributes()

Get LexisNexis Instant ID attribute data associated with the RIS transaction. Please contact your Kount representative to enable support for this feature in your merchant account.

getPrefixedResponseDataMap

protected  getPrefixedResponseDataMap(string $prefix)

Get a map of the response data where the keys are the RIS response keys that begin with a specified prefix.

Parameters

$prefix - Key prefix.
